hero.title: Make your Dream Wedding With Us
hero.subtitle: Ensure every detail of your fairytale wedding is perfect.

about.title: Meet Ellie team, best in town wedding planner
about.body: We provide the premier wedding planning service. We specialize in creating unforgettable and beautiful weddings that reflect your unique style and personality. Let us make your dream wedding a reality.

testimonials.title: Love Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from couples who trusted us with their special day

items.name: Sarah & James
items.text: Working with Elite Wedding Planner was the best decision we made. They transformed our vision into reality and handled every detail flawlessly. Our wedding was absolutely perfect!

items.name: A-Chau & Bradley
items.text: We just did it quickly on the plane now actually - we sent a bit more than what you asked - the rest is for you girls as a little extra to say thank you so much for the support. We had an amazing wedding thank to you girls ü•∞ü•∞ we hope you continue to support more couples on their special day!!

packages.title: Wedding Packages
packages.subtitle: Choose the perfect package for your celebration, or let us create a custom solution

package1.title: Full Wedding Package
package1.desc: For couples who want full support from A to Z.

before.title: Before the wedding
items: Consultation and detailed planning for decoration style and program that fits your budget.
Survey venues together with the couple.
Create detailed script for the program.
Coordinate delivery schedules with vendors.
Design and print invitations and necessary decoration details.

during.title: On the wedding day
items: Work directly with restaurants and hotels.
Welcome guests and guide according to family requirements.
Supervise sound, lighting, and program timeline.
Coordinate MC, band, makeup, decoration...
Work with filming and photography teams and handle logistics.
Flexibly handle any issues that arise.

after.title: After the wedding
items: Work with filming and photography teams for final edits.
Support resolving any issues (if any).
Acceptance and payment of remaining amounts with vendors.

package2.title: Wedding Coordination Package
package2.desc: Suitable for couples who have already planned in detail.

scope.title: Scope of work
items: Receive and review the couple's complete plan.
Create detailed timeline for the wedding day.
Coordinate vendors (decoration, sound, lighting, filming, photography...).
Guide bridesmaids, groomsmen, and both families.
Monitor program progress and handle any incidents.
Focus on the 1-2 months before the wedding day.

for.title: For couples
items: Who have already chosen venues, booked services, and designed scripts.
Want to fully enjoy the wedding day without worrying about timeline.
Have family/friends support but still want professionals to ensure everything.

pay.title: Easily pay in instalments with Ellie Pay
pay.body: Pay for your wedding at a pace that suits you with Ellie Pay. Spread your payments across 24+ months, with the ability to pay your suppliers from wherever you may be.

contact.title: Let's Plan Your Perfect Day
contact.subtitle: Ready to start planning? Get in touch with us today for a complimentary consultation. We'd love to hear about your vision and discuss how we can bring it to life.

form.venueLabel: Do you have a venue? Provide venue if available
form.venuePlaceholder: Enter venue name and address if you have one...
form.visionPlaceholder: Share your wedding dreams with us...
